short_summary: Supply of marine power cable for a Canadian Coast Guard Ship
description: Canada requires the supply of 1200 meters of Marine Power Cable, which is to be installed aboard the Canadian Coast Guard Ship, Sir Wilfrid Laurier.
full_summary:
### Supply Power Generation Cable

**Reference:** cb-8275-17610307
**Date Released:** 2023-08-21
**Closing Date:** 2023-09-14 (14:00:00 ET)

**Description:**

Canada's Fisheries and Oceans Department seeks to award a supply arrangement for the procurement of electrical power generation cables. The required quantity is approximately 1200 meters of marine power cable, which will be installed on the Canadian Coast Guard Ship, **Sir Wilfrid Laurier**.

**Supplies Required:**

* Electrical wire and cable, subcom cases, and cable accessories

**Bid Evaluation Criteria:**

The tender will be evaluated based on the lowest price.

**Eligible Bidders:**

This call for tenders is open to most qualified bidders. However, Canadian and foreign bidders may be exempt from this process.

**Notice:** This call for tenders was implemented under a variety of trade agreements:
* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement (CHFTA)
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* ...and others (refer to the full text for the complete list).

**Contract Details:**

* Contract Start Date: 2023-09-08
* Contract End Date: 2023-01-19
* Location of Contract Performance: North Vancouver, British Columbia

**Authorized Agency Contact:**

* Carina Della Valle, Contracting and Procurement Officer
* Procurement Office: Fisheries and Oceans Canada - Procurement Office
* Address: 200 Kent Street, Ottawa, Ontario K1A0E6
* Phone: (343) 542-9691
* Email: [carina.dellavalle@dfo-mpo.gc.ca](mailto:carina.dellavalle@dfo-mpo.gc.ca) 

**The full notice is available via […]**

We'll be happy to help with any further inquiries you may have. Please feel free to adjust the similar parts to what you want to add or to make it more emphasized.

Best regards,
